detail_desc: Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Christmas jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a shaped neckline, long sleeves and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Skinny-fit dungarees in washed, superstretch denim with adjustable straps, a high waist and zip in one side. Chest pocket, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets with a press-stud.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Oversized jacket in imitation leather with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front and flap front pockets. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a small collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sandals with appliqués on the front, a hook and loop fastener, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a sweetheart neckline, gathers at the front and elastication and a frill trim over the shoulders. Long, slightly wider sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a flared peplum. Lined at the front.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in a crêpe weave with notch lapels and welt front pockets. Lined.
Smartphone bag in soft imitation suede with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and decorative metal ring. Lined. Width 10 cm. Height 15 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft weave. 100x150 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with buttons at the back of the neck and two frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Short-sleeved sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Short dress in a softly draping viscose weave. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with pattern-knit sections and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short dungaree shorts in washed, stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Set with a T-shirt and a pair of dungaree shorts in soft, organic cotton. T-shirt in soft slub jersey. Dungaree shorts with buttons at the sides, detachable elastic straps with a button, and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a glittery text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist, all-over print and ribbed hems.
Short jacket in cotton twill with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with trumpet cuffs in broderie anglaise. Lined.
5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist, a zip fly and button, and tapered legs with a visible seam at the knees.

Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Buttons on one shoulder, at the crotch and down the legs, and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a gentle V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front.
Sleeveless, ankle-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt that flares gently to the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Metal earrings with round pendants decorated with large sequins. Length approx. 8 cm.
Sleeveless all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch and short legs with ribbed hems.
Fitted turtleneck top in soft lace made from a cotton blend with long sleeves.
Calf-length dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck and concealed zip at the back. Long dolman sleeves, a seam at the waist and a cotton canvas skirt.
Padded laptop case in soft, grained leather with a zip. Cotton twill lining. Size 24.5x33.5 cm. Suitable for laptops up to 13".
Straight-cut blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a collar, V-neck and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in jersey crêpe with lace insets, a round neckline and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and a bell-shaped skirt.
Long-sleeved nursing top in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated seam and decorative ties at the waist and a wrapover front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small imitation suede appliqué at the hem.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top, an unlined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jersey-lined trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy. Elasticated waist with a twisted drawstring and one back pocket.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Jacket and trousers in soft fabric. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard and lined hood with ears on the top. Trousers in fleece with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Dress in a cool, patterned cotton weave with a smocked bodice and narrow shoulder straps with a sewn-on bow at the top. Gathered seam at the hips and a lace trim at the hem. Unlined.
Wide hairband in jersey with a decorative knot at the front and silicone inside to keep hair in place. Width 7 cm. The polyester content of the hairband is recycled.
Short, wide coat in soft faux shearling with notch lapels, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and large patch pockets. Recycled polyester lining.

Gently flared blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Gathered seams on the shoulders and lower section, decorative, gathered ties at the front, darts at the back and a button at the cuffs.
Straight-cut vest top in a viscose weave with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Leggings in very sturdy jersey with concealed elastication at the waist, sewn-in creases and a concealed zip at the hems.
Straight-cut, relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft pima cotton jersey containing some silk.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour and press-studs at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Knee-length shorts in printed cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front pockets.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved pointelle tops in soft cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and cuffs.
Shorts in cotton jersey with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, and side pockets.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Canvas linings and insoles. Heel 3 cm.
Long dress in a pleated weave. Narrow cut with an opening at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Blouse in soft lace made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.

Short dress in airy, crinkled plumeti chiffon. Wide neckline with a small opening and drawstring at the front, and long sleeves with a flounced trim at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Imitation leather sandals with crossover straps at the front and an adjustable heel strap with a metal fastener and concealed elastication. Rubber soles with a fluted underside.
Suede ankle boots with a wide shaft. pointed toes and covered heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cotton rib knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned crêpe weave with covered buttons and an opening at the front.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a pleated weave with narrow shoulder straps and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Wide top in a soft weave with a wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top and long, flared sleeves with smock details.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with mesh sections and a racer back.
Jersey top with a lace yoke and gathers at the top in a relaxed fit. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Slides with faux fur at the top and a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Sun visor in braided straw with a woven top and wide elastic strap with a metal fastener at the back.
